description:
Haru arrives at Charisma Castle, where Yujin is being held by Leviathan. There, he faces off with the strongest of the Ultimate Four, Charismon, and learns the true identity of the sinister Cloud!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyokugen no Gekitou! Globemon VS Charmon!
The Ultimate Clash! Globemon Versus Charismon!
極限の激闘! グローブモンVSカリスモン!
